message.body: What is the name of heejin's brother's country club?
Chung-woo I think. Her brother in law actually.
The area is called Hoengseong-gun in Gangwon-do province
They have a website cwgc.kr but it's not really in English
Definitely Korean. Much more refined sounding than Chinese. I can demonstrate for you next time we are together in a very offensive way.
Congrats, just saw on Facebook you're an uncle.
It seems so. With your mother.
Totally nuts. Jeff is loving it. They're pretty bold-they're talking about coming to NY in a few weeks with Alice.
Agree. But they have to start preparing her for Korea.

Yes. October 10. It's a Thursday actually. A little annoying for the Korean guests because it's a work night but for the Americans who will take a week off anyway it's actually a little easier to have a couple of days before and after,
I intended to explain all of this on the phone on Saturday- did you get my voicemail?
Gotcha. Good glad you agree. And 10/10 is a catchy date, we thought.
Sounds good. And congrats on formalizing your move too. Let's talk soon
Good night
Hey dude I drove down last night with Justin - we are here until tomorrow. You guys going to the Marshalls' tonight?
Very cool. You have plans tomorrow? We are talking about golf- any interest?
Maybe noon +/- an hour either way. Dont wanna get back to NY too late. They're thinking Cobb's creek, if that's important.
Ok well the timing is likely not to work out unfortunately, but we can see
Cool. So should we count you in? Would wanna know if we should start asking other guys instead if you thought you wouldn't come
Those two don't follow necessary. You suck? And you're also going to golf? Or you suck so you might end up not golfing
You like how I'm belaboring this?
Can't tell if that's a joke and you want me to play this game again, or if youre saying you don't feel well
Oh! I'm worse, dont worry. Now I understand. Texting is hard
We are up, about to eat breakfast
Breaking news: tee time moved to 1:07
Let's meet there 12:45
We had initially reserved 12:37 but are running about 10 minutes behind so we moved to 1:07.
It is quite specific, yes. We can ask them about that when we get there.
Cool. Is today a Vespa day?
True. Good point.
Happy birthday, buddy! Hope you get to celebrate today.
Oh that's right! How did it to?
Go?
Whoa! Im sure there were more than 3 guys- that's awesome, congrats!
How long did you train for
Awesome job.
Yes

Sorry we were at a wedding last night and my phone was dead. Cool. We are about to leave NY- our big activity of the day is likely to be the art museum. It's me Heejin and one of her friends visiting from Korea. Justin told me he's sick so I don't know ho
Nice timing
Cool. Even if it just ends up being dinner with you guys it would be cool to see you.
Ah sorry to hear that. The rainy day probably doesn't help.
You know what else does? New York traffic. Still haven't gotten out of the city...
Just got to Philly, finally. Cheesesteak top priority for our Korean visitor, so we are at Jim's. We'll see how much time we have for art museum after this- maybe not much at all (closes at 5).
Yes. Have work tomorrow and unless Justin is too sick to sit in the car, I was going to drive him back so he could go into the lab tonight.
Yeah it's a funny plan we have here. We were planning to leave maybe around 7, after an early dinner. He doesn't have to stay there long, I believe, just a quick stop.

Dunno. I'm texting with Chris/Justin to see if they're going to join and to get some suggestions. Right now we are finishing up at Jim's and will probably walk around south street a little. If we ate out it would probably be around 6 since we are sharing
Ok. I understand. It's a weird day at this point. And now I have Justin saying we should head back to NY ASAP
Yeah. Not the day I thought we'd have. Is there some awesome idea I haven't thought of to bring everyone together?
Haha. When are you moving?
When in August?
Ok. So we have two months.
No they're not going to do that, you're right. We made up to head back to NY around 6:30. Still in old city now. We may walk around penns campus - if we do that, we can swing by you.
Good stuff. Heejin says hi back
